names.bio: Troy Doherty is an accomplished actor, singer, songwriter, musician, parkour/free running and avid student. He's been on various TV shows including the co-host of Nickelodeon's Nick Studio 10, Guest Star on Criminal Minds, Victorious, New Girl, Mike and Molly, Welcome to the Family, to name a few. Film credits include Hickey (filming), Hachi: A Dog's Tale, 24 Hours of Peace, and The Life Lessons of William Gwilliam. Troy's theatre career began at age 10 in theaters in the New York/New Jersey area. Troy, in the production of Lionel Bart's Musical "Oliver!", played the role of the Artful Dodger opposite Michelle DeJean and Neal Bernari. His other roles include "Scut Farcus" in the pre-Broadway world premiere of A Christmas Story, The Musical as well as The Secret Garden, "13" The Musical, The Wedding Singer and most recently as Beethoven in Dog Sees God: Confession of a Teenage Blockhead preformed at the Santa Monica Playhouse, Santa Monica, CA. When Troy's not in front of the camera or on the musical theatre stage (or doing back flips - literally), he's writing, jamming, and producing his own brand of music. Troy's EP "Citizen Arrest" is a pop-rock extravaganza with a mature twist. Troy's written the songs, is the lead vocalist, play's acoustic guitar and piano. Felicia Barton is the backup vocalist, (runner up on the successful T.V. show American Idol® and who sings backup vocals for Katie Perry). Joe King (lead guitarist of The Fray) plays lead guitar on the EP. All other collaborators are well known Nashville musical talent. Troy is a member of Tempest FreeRunning Academy in SoCal where he perfects his parkour and free running training. He's been a traucer for the past 4 years and was honored to participate in the first Parkour/Freerunning Olympics 2013 in SoCal. Troy resides in Los Angeles, CA, Atlanta, GA, and his hometown Wall Township, New Jersey.
names.name: Troy Doherty

filmography.title: The Life Lessons of William Gwilliam
